code: @Override public boolean applyFilterToCamelHeaders(String headerName, Object headerValue, Exchange exchange) {     boolean answer = super.applyFilterToExternalHeaders(headerName, headerValue, exchange).     // the header to included as HTTP header also (eg as duplicate value)     if (!answer) {         if (templateUri != null) {             String token = "{" + headerName + "}".             if (templateUri.contains(token)) {                 answer = true.             }         }         if (!answer && queryParameters != null) {             // encoded values for { }             String token = "=%7B" + headerName + "%7D".             if (queryParameters.contains(token)) {                 answer = true.             }         }     }     return answer. }
